elements.text:
You've been texting with someone you really like and they're usually quick to respond. You notice that they saw your message a couple of hours ago and did not respond. 

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I want to ask what they think of me, but decide to give it more time.
I send a bunch of messages back to back to see if they respond.
I call a friend and ask them about their day.
I want to spend my day focused on my phone, but instead do hobbies I enjoy.
I keep going with my day.
